update cartonWarehousing
order_account = #{orderAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
custom_name = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update cartonWarehousing set order_account = #{orderAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom_name = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carton_length = #{cartonLength,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, carton_width = #{cartonWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, carton_height = #{cartonHeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pit_type_name = #{pitTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carton_price = #{cartonPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rk_num = #{rkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rk_time = #{rkTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reservoir = #{reservoir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pallet_number = #{palletNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fake = #{fake,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rk_name = #{rkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rk_pihao = #{rkPihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baosun = #{baosun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER} where rk_id = #{rkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select rk_pihao from cartonWarehousing where fake=0 and rk_id=(select max(rk_id) from cartonWarehousing where fake=0 and rk_pihao like #{time}"%")
